GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
video: fbdev: amba-clcd: Fix refcount leak bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit a97ff8a949dbf41be89f436b2b1a2b3d794493df, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit d10715be03bd8bad59ddc50236cb140c3bd73c7b. For more details please see the references link.
